body:
Fixes:
- [[104](https://github.com/braedon/prometheus-es-exporter/issues/104)] Count objects in mappings field counts
- Don't log successful Elasticsearch requests by default

Enhancements:
- [[88](https://github.com/braedon/prometheus-es-exporter/pull/88)] Support [composite aggregations](https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/current/search-aggregations-bucket-composite-aggregation.html)

Fixes:
- [[87](https://github.com/braedon/prometheus-es-exporter/pull/87)] Don't parse the `_default_` mapping type in pre ES7 servers

Enhancements:
- [[81](https://github.com/braedon/prometheus-es-exporter/pull/81)] Add concurrent query execution support (thanks @hemanthkini)
- [[85](https://github.com/braedon/prometheus-es-exporter/pull/85)] Support for custom HTTP headers (thanks @rg2011)

Enhancements:
- [[80](https://github.com/braedon/prometheus-es-exporter/pull/80)] Allow limiting indices included in indices stats when using indices mode (thanks @thenextfreelancer)

Fixes:
- Actually raise errors when certain invalid CLI option combinations are used

Fixes:
- [[75](https://github.com/braedon/prometheus-es-exporter/pull/75)] Fix issue where a query metric going missing would cause an error (thanks @nithyashree675)

Fixes:
- [[73](https://github.com/braedon/prometheus-es-exporter/pull/73)] Fix nodes stats parsing for AWS managed Elasticsearch clusters

Enhancements:
- [[32](https://github.com/braedon/prometheus-es-exporter/issues/32)] Add helm chart (thanks @alexppg)
- [[71](https://github.com/braedon/prometheus-es-exporter/pull/71)] Add metric for index aliases

Fixes:
-  Fix issue where main config file is required even when queries are disabled

Enhancements:
- [[68](https://github.com/braedon/prometheus-es-exporter/issues/68)] Add a metric for the count of mapped fields by index and field type

Enhancements:
- [[63](https://github.com/braedon/prometheus-es-exporter/issues/63)] Enable loading all configuration options from a file (thanks @RobertKirk)

Enhancements:
- [[60](https://github.com/braedon/prometheus-es-exporter/issues/60)] Add new metrics for the three cluster/index/shard status colours

Breaking Changes:
- [[38](https://github.com/braedon/prometheus-es-exporter/issues/38)] Drop old metrics on query failure (behaviour configurable via [`QueryOnError` config](exporter.cfg#L17))
- [[57](https://github.com/braedon/prometheus-es-exporter/pull/57)] Drop old metrics that are missing from subsequent query runs (behaviour configurable via [`QueryOnMissing` config](exporter.cfg#L23))

Enhancements:
- Add support for python 3.7
- Optimise Dockerfile

Enhancements:
- [[50](https://github.com/braedon/prometheus-es-exporter/pull/50)] Add the `--config-dir` option (thanks @weasellin)
- [[51](https://github.com/braedon/prometheus-es-exporter/pull/51)] Add support for client cert & key (thanks @sojoner)

Fixes:
- [[41](https://github.com/braedon/prometheus-es-exporter/issues/41)] Fix parsing of hits total for ES7+ (thanks @giganteous)
- [[42](https://github.com/braedon/prometheus-es-exporter/issues/42)] Fix parsing of aggregations that return non-numeric values (thanks @giganteous)

Fixes:
- Fix memory leak in docker image.

Enhancements:
- [[26](https://github.com/braedon/prometheus-es-exporter/pull/26)] Add basic auth support (thanks @nicholasgibson2)

Fixes:
- Detect and replace disallowed characters in metric names and label keys

Fixes:
- Parse node-level index metrics from nodes stats

Fixes:
- Replace syntax that is incompatible with Python 3.4

Fixes:
- Allow changing the timeouts used when fetching cluster metrics
- Log cluster metric fetch timeouts as warnings, rather than errors
- Report whether a cluster metric fetch succeeded via a metric, [see here for why](https://prometheus.io/docs/instrumenting/writing_exporters/#failed-scrapes)

Breaking Changes:
- Default port changed from 8080 to 9206, [see here for why](https://github.com/prometheus/prometheus/wiki/Default-port-allocations)
- Cluster metrics queried from Elasticsearch on metric scrape, not on a schedule, [see here for why](https://prometheus.io/docs/instrumenting/writing_exporters/#scheduling) (Data queries are still run on schedules)

Enhancements:
- Allow retrieving fieldata info for specific fields
- Expose query `took` time as a metric
- Allow limiting metrics returned in nodes/indices stats
- Allow enabling SSL verification (thanks @echojc)
- Allow queries to have custom timeouts (thanks @echojc)
- Allow setting arbitrary logging levels

Enhancements:
- Add cluster metrics

Breaking Changes:
- New bucket label format

Enhancements:
- Add SIGTERM handler
- Optimise Dockerfile
- Add JSON structured logging support

Bug Fixes:
- Fix exceptions when generating label values for numeric bucket names

Bug Fixes:
- Fix certain query responses generating invalid metric names with periods in them

Bug Fixes:
- Complain if the config file is missing, rather than exiting mysteriously
- Warn if no queries are found in the config file, rather than exiting mysteriously
